short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Stay healthy at your desk with customizable reminders for eye breaks, hydration, movement, and stretching.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Recharge helps you maintain healthy habits while working at your computer by providing gentle, customizable reminders for essential breaks. With a clean, intuitive interface, Recharge runs quietly in the background while helping you take better care of yourself during long work sessions.
